name: Fire truck emergency rescue 3D simulator free 2016
name_original: Fire truck emergency rescue 3D simulator free 2016
description:
3D Fire truck emergency rescue simulator free 2016 is an amazing challenging simulator game. Drive around the city in your real fire truck putting off fires and saving civilians’ property. Respond as the 911-rescue simulator and directly reach the accidental site and use the water hose to put off the fire on the buildings. People’s lives are depending on your expert driving skills of fire truck. Avoid accidents and collisions with the other traffic vehicles. Reach the emergency spot as soon the as possible. Park the fire fighter on a specific parking area to extinguish the fire. So get ready to save the lives of mankind by putting off the fire with the help of water nozzle of fire truck.
***3D Fire truck emergency rescue simulator free 2016 Features***
• Multiple challenging levels
• Realistic 3D Detailed city Environment
• Splendid gameplay
• Accurate Driving Experience
• Realistic Animated Passengers
• Marvelous eye catching Graphics
• Smooth and easy controls
• Amazing game sounds
